long_description: Sturdy enough for all-mountain riding and comfortable enough for all-day wear, the Zoic Navaeh women's bike shorts offer a versatile, women-specific design to keep you happy in the saddle. Rugged, quick-drying outer shorts endure heavy use and offer a slight bit of stretch so that they move with you; 11.5 in. inseam is designed to fall just at the knees. Waistband of outer shorts features rip-and-stick adjustment tabs for a customizable fit; waistband also has a flat front along with a double snap and zip fly closure. Removable stretch mesh liner shorts wick moisture away and sport a built-in, women-specific chamois pad that is anatomically shaped for comfort in the saddle. Liner shorts have a 5 in. inseam, tagless waistline and a compressive fit; liner shorts can be worn on their own for added versatility. The Zoic Navaeh bike shorts feature 2 zip hand pockets, 2 leg zip pockets and a hidden back zip pocket. Media player pocket features a headphone port and cord-routing loop-perfect for tunes on the go.
short_description: Sturdy enough for all-mountain riding and comfortable enough for all-day wear, the Zoic Navaeh women's bike shorts offer a versatile, women-specific design to keep you happy in the saddle.
